source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_RISK_OPPORTUNITY_REGISTER_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'Y'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_utc_tag is null
			   and original_blob_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.File_Pattern}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Not_Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and (etl_run_status like 'FAIL%' or etl_run_status like 'RUN%')
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as string,
		Likelihood as string,
		Severity as string,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as string,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as string,
		Residual_Severity as string,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as string,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as string,
		Quarterly_Incidents as string,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code]\nFROM [relational].[OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Type]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalRiskOpportunityType
ValidatedRiskOppIDandDate@ValidDateAndRiskOppID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidRiskOppType@ValidRiskOppType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndIncidentID split(not(isNull(Derived_Risk_Opp_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && iif(not(isNull(Date_Lodged)),not(isNull(Derived_Date_Lodged)),true()) && iif(not(isNull(Date_Closed)),not(isNull(Derived_Date_Closed)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedRiskOppIDandDate@(ValidDateAndRiskOppID, InvalidDateOrRiskOppID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Date_Lodged = toDate(Date_Lodged,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Date_Closed = toDate(Date_Closed,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Risk_Opp_ID = toInteger(Risk_Opp_ID)) ~> ConvertDateAndIncidentID
InvalidDateOrRiskOppIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrIRiskOppID
ValidatedRiskOppIDandDate@InvalidDateOrRiskOppID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Lodged Date / Closed Date / Risk Opp ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrRiskOppIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrIRiskOppID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidRiskOppType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalRiskOppType lookup(Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code == Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalRiskOppType
RelationalRiskOpportunityType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code = Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalRiskOppType
LookupRelationalRiskOppType split(not(isNull(Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidRiskOppType@(ValidRiskOppType, InvalidRiskOppType)
IsValidRiskOppType@InvalidRiskOppType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Risk Type Code")) ~> InvalidRiskOppTypeerrormessage
InvalidRiskOppTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidRiskOppType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as string,
		Likelihood as string,
		Severity as string,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as string,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as string,
		Residual_Severity as string,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as string,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as string,
		Quarterly_Incidents as string,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as string,
		Likelihood as string,
		Severity as string,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as string,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as string,
		Residual_Severity as string,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as string,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as string,
		Quarterly_Incidents as string,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as integer,
		Severity as integer,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as integer,
		Residual_Severity as integer,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Quarterly_Incidents as integer,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalRiskOpportunityRegister
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConvertNumberToString derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,Risk_Ops_Descripton,Actions_Controls,Date_Lodged,Likelihood,Severity,Inherent_Risk_Rating,Eliminate_Mitigate,Residual_Likelihood,Residual_Severity,Residual_Risk_Rating,Future_Controls,Person_Responsible,Date_Closed,Quarterly_Incidents,Risk_Opps_Flag)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Risk_Opp_ID = Risk_Opp_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code = Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Relation_Risk_Ops_Descripton = Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Relation_Actions_Controls = Actions_Controls,
		Relation_Date_Lodged = Date_Lodged,
		Relation_Likelihood = Likelihood,
		Relation_Severity = Severity,
		Relation_Inherent_Risk_Rating = Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Relation_Eliminate_Mitigate = Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Relation_Residual_Likelihood = Residual_Likelihood,
		Relation_Residual_Severity = Residual_Severity,
		Relation_Residual_Risk_Rating = Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Relation_Future_Controls = Future_Controls,
		Relation_Person_Responsible = Person_Responsible,
		Relation_Date_Closed = Date_Closed,
		Relation_Quarterly_Incidents = Quarterly_Incidents,
		Relation_Risk_Opps_Flag = Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndID derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,Risk_Ops_Descripton,Actions_Controls,Date_Lodged,Likelihood,Severity,Inherent_Risk_Rating,Eliminate_Mitigate,Residual_Likelihood,Residual_Severity,Residual_Risk_Rating,Future_Controls,Person_Responsible,Date_Closed,Quarterly_Incidents,Risk_Opps_Flag)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Risk_Opp_ID == Relation_Risk_Opp_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingRiskOpportunityReg@NewRiskOpportunityReg select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Date_Lodged = toDate(Date_Lodged, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Date_Closed = toDate(Date_Closed, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Risk_Opp_ID = toInteger(Risk_Opp_ID)) ~> ConvertDatesAndID
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingRiskOpportunityReg@(NewRiskOpportunityReg, ChangedRiskOpportunityReg, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingRiskOpportunityReg@ChangedRiskOpportunityReg derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID = Relation_Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
RelationalRiskOpportunityRegister derive(Likelihood = toString(Likelihood),
		Severity = toString(Severity),
		Inherent_Risk_Rating = toString(Inherent_Risk_Rating),
		Residual_Likelihood = toString(Residual_Likelihood),
		Residual_Severity = toString(Residual_Severity),
		Residual_Risk_Rating = toString(Residual_Risk_Rating),
		Quarterly_Incidents = toString(Quarterly_Incidents)) ~> ConvertNumberToString
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as integer,
		Severity as integer,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as integer,
		Residual_Severity as integer,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Quarterly_Incidents as integer,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Risk_Opp_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow
